solution_line_template: Marie will read {messages_read_per_day} but gain {new_messages_per_day} unread messages a day, so she will lower the number of messages by {messages_read_per_day} - {new_messages_per_day} = <<{messages_read_per_day}-{new_messages_per_day}={net_messages_cleared_per_day}>>{net_messages_cleared_per_day}.

Thus, it will take her {initial_unread_messages} / {net_messages_cleared_per_day} = <<{initial_unread_messages}/{net_messages_cleared_per_day}={days_to_clear_messages}>>{days_to_clear_messages} days to read all her unread messages.
